metadata.title: CVE-2022-28044 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Irzip v0.640 was discovered to contain a heap memory corruption via thecomponent lrzip.c:initialise_control.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28044` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631-1+deb9u3build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.631-1+deb9u3build0.18.04.1').
